changeSet.author: Bethany Armitage
changeSet.createView: select vac.id as rid, vac.responded_by, vac.requested_by, vac.is_approved, vac.start_date_time, vac.end_date_time, requester.first_name as requester_first_name, requester.last_name as requester_last_name, responder.first_name as responder_first_name, responder.last_name as responder_last_name from requests_vacation vac left join ( select * from employee )requester on vac.requested_by = requester.id left join ( select * from employee )responder on vac.responded_by = responder.id
